summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Parks and Recreation and the damage to public park facilities caused by the storms of December 21-31, 1990; ratifying and confirming the declaration of emergency by the Board of Public Works, actions to protect public facilities and prevent or abate public hazards; authorizing the Mayor to enter into agreements for federal assistance; making a reimbursable appropriation from the Emergency Fund; and declaring an emergency therefor.
